error_messages.401_1: Your email has not yet been verified. Please check your inbox. If you did not receive our verification email tell us via hello@lokabees.com
error_messages.401: Invalid credentials. Please enter a correct username and password.
error_messages.500: An unknown error occured. Try reloading the page and login again.

reset_password.title: Reset password
reset_password.text: No problem, it happens to the best! Just enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.

reset_password_success.title: Your password has been reset!
reset_password_success.text: Now look into your inbox and click the link to reset your password.

error.continue_home: You can continue on our homepage or try reloading the page again.

signup.title: Register your shop
signup.text: Register your shop easily with lokabees!
signup.name: What's your name?
signup.check_inbox: Check your Email inbox and confirm your Email to login
signup.accept_terms: By clicking 'Sign Up' you agree to our privacy policy an accept our terms of use.
signup.updates_offers_consent: I want to be informed about new updates and offers. I can withdraw my consent at any time in the future on www.lokabees.de/abmelden or on the end of each e-mail.

error_messages.500: An unknown error occured. Try reloading the page and login again.

step_1.title: Complete your store profile now
step_1.text: With an informative profile page, your store will be easier to find and will attract more buyers
step_1.name: What's the name of the store?
step_1.categories: Which keywords best describe your store?

step_2.title: Opening hours
step_2.text: Enter your opening hours so that customers know when they can visit your shop

step_3.title: Pick up and delivery
step_3.text: Can your customers pick up their products at the store or have it delivered to their home?
step_3.pickup_text: Customers can reserve products and collect them from your store.
step_3.delivery_text: Customers can have your products delivered to their home.
step_3.ship_text: You send your products by post or a logistics service provider

step_4.title: Customer contact
step_4.text: How can customers and prospective buyers get in touch with you?

step_5.title: Photos and Videos
step_5.text: Help potential customers to get an idea of ​​you and your shop.
step_5.text_store: The people in your neighborhood will recognize your store - especially from the outside. Upload a photo of your shop front here to increase the recognition value.
step_5.text_you: You and your team are what makes your store unique. Show the world who you are so your customers know who they are dealing with. If you don't want that, you can also show the interior of your shop here.
step_5.you_photo: Picture of your, your team or inside of your store
step_5.text_extra_points: A video is worth a thousand pictures. If you already have one from your shop, just paste the link here.
step_5.yt_link: Youtube link to a short video from your store

success.title: Congratulations, your store is now online!
success.text1: Together we have taken the first big step towards digitalizing your shop. You should be proud of that!
success.text2: But this is only the beginning. Set up your new shop and add some products.
success.text3: Then use our lokabees-academy to learn step by step how to be successful online without any previous knowledge!
success.text4: You can change the settings you have made at any time under `My profile`.

validation_errors.password: The password must contain at least: 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, and one special character (E.g. , . _ & ? etc)

error_messages.400: Something went wrong. Please contact support.
error_messages.500: An unknown error occured. Try reloading the page and login again.
error_messages.network: We can not reach the server. Please check your internet connection.
